DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish initial safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics MYK-461 human subject . This randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , sequential group , single ascending ( oral ) dose study healthy volunteer age 18-55 year .
DOC.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study MYK-461 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Normal body mass index ( BMI ) Normal LVEF Normal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Females must breastfeed must permanently sterilize postmenopausal . Any structural abnormality echocardiography Positive result HIV test and/or seropositive HCV HBV .
